## Senior Biostatistician

I am a senior biostatistician with experience supporting clinical, epidemiologic,
and public health research. My work focuses on rigorous study design, transparent
statistical modeling, and reproducible reporting.

### Areas of Expertise
- Regression modeling (GLM, GLMM)
- Survival analysis
- Penalized regression (LASSO)
- Multiple imputation
- Neighborhood- and multilevel analyses

### Tools
R, SAS, Python, Quarto, Git
